attributes.action: Hold a parliamentary vote on the whether or not the UK leaves the EU
attributes.additional_details:
[1] Referendum not legally binding:
http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/jun/23/eu-referendum-legally-binding-brexit-lisbon-cameron-sovereign-parliament

[2] Parliamentary sovereignty:
https://www.parliament.uk/about/how/role/sovereignty/
attributes.background:
The result of the 23 June 2016 referendum on Britain's EU membership was NOT legally binding; it was advisory.

We the undersigned believe in parliamentary sovereignty. We believe MPs should vote on whether or not we leave the EU - and be responsible and accountable for the outcome of this vote.
